name: Amazing Coastal Walk Adventure (Green North of Tenerife)
description: We will see one of the most beautiful walking tracks in the lush, green North of Tenerife. We are going to start our walk in front of Loro Parque in Puerto de la Cruz (easy to find meeting point) and follow the coastal walk for a few kilometers. On our way, we will walk along beautiful cliff coast, pass the beautiful little coastal town Toscal, spot a picturesque ruin by the ocean (photo spot!!!), walk through a beautiful palm grove, visit a spring and as biggest highlight, we will visit a beautiful black sand beach, which is top secret and rarely visited by tourists.By the way, the walk is moderate, so you need to have a good level of fitness, we will be walking up- and downhill for several hours. Please bring comfy shoes, enough water and some snacks.
